title: playground: bad error message in Go Playground when package != "main"
body:
http://play.golang.org/p/gnZZOxKTko (or just use the standard Playground template and change `package main` to `package foo`)

The error message is confusing and seems like an internal error:

```
Error while loading "/tmp/sandbox046656083/a.out": Cannot open NaCl module file
Using the wrong type of nexe (nacl-x86-32 on an x86-64 or vice versa)
or a corrupt nexe file may be responsible for this error.
```

A better error message would hint that the package must be `main`, like the error message when a `func main()` is missing.
